"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f7c6076368727b11af0000#post_53f7c6076368727b11af0000
It's purely on a need to know basis.

Now if you excuse me, I need to go do a thing.

*Exits the room*

*Meanwhile*

[spoiler]It's almost complete! I just need 9 things, First up, A sperm sample from an eevee...

*After I put it into a Slot, A ding is heard*

Excellent! Now a fire stone...

*Ding*

A Water stone...

*Ding*

A Thunder Stone...

*Ding*

Fur from an espeon...

*Ding*

Sweat from an umbreon...

*Ding*

Ice from an Icy rock...

*Ding*

Moss from a moss rock...

*Ding*

And Finally A blood sample from a Sylveon...

*Ding*

And we're golden!

???: Are you Sure the Elemental stones will work for this?

For the last time, Yes, I tested a previous version on some willing test subjects, And they worked just fine, Now if you'll excuse me...

@CHARGE COMPLETE@

*Takes a Rifle with a Dish-like End off of some ominous looking machine*

I've got work to do.

*Walks out of the lab*[/spoiler]

*Sits back down where he was with an odd looking device in his hands, Kind of like a rifle*
